entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times early in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
